property.name: Rules
property.value: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch carefully. The gap between death and victory is thinner than your blade."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance {T}, Sacrifice Bounty Agent: Destroy target legendary permanent that's an artifact, creature, or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lately I've seen the biggest bounties of my career - and for the biggest names."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+2 and has vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Selesnya guildmages do not sleep so the rest of the Conclave can.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures with toughness 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh, you fellas are going to love the lockup. Excellent gruel. Very low ceilings." - Libuse, Boros sergeant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Reports of Gruul rioters in four districts. Start with the big ones and work your way up." - Libuse, Boros sergeant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) When Conclave Tribunal enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Conclave Tribunal leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Exile target artifact. • Exile target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet mage knew she would neither get her thermoinverter back nor have the satisfaction of exploding it herself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card. {3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To wage war, secure peace within yourself." - Emmara

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's no greater honor than joining your chosen guild, and no greater shame than failing it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, that many 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance are created instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The angels appreciated the offer but politely declined to eat any birdseed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yes, there's competition between our equenauts and the Boros skyjeks. At least they think it's a competition."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You won't need the sword drills, your shields, or my blessing. You'll fight for Sunhome with the truth in your heart." - Aurelia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Haazda Marshal and at least two other creatures attack, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ravnica's convoluted power structure often boils down to who can muster the most swords on a given block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wounded see the glow of its vials long before they see its wings diving out of the clouds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Hunted Witness dies, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He ferried weapons, spells, exotic animals - but his most dangerous cargo was the truth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Inspiring Unicorn attacks, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are two lives: the life you live before you see a unicorn, and the life you live after.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Intrusive Packbeast enters the battlefield, tap up to two target creatures your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Good at carrying things. Really good at knocking them down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've raised her since she was a pup, and she's raised me since I was a recruit."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) When Light of the Legion dies, put a +1/+1 counter on each white creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) When Loxodon Restorer enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Article 5.8.2. Ensure proper restraint of any and all arms, legs, claws, jaws, tails, tentacles, and tendrils as appropriate." - Azorius Arrester Procedure, Appendix B

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Too many have disappeared in these dark days. I am the light that will lead them home."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Righteous Blow deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Golgari believe they should be given what they deserve. On this we agree." - Tajic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Roc Charger attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rocs' innate fearlessness makes them ideal mounts for emergency response.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Skyline Scout attacks, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes an angel passes by and gives me a little nod, like, ‘You're a daring one!' That always makes my day."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before I let you wield one of these, let's see you dodge one!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The trouble with youths these days is that, in outright defiance of their elders, they refuse to be bought." - Karlov of the Ghost Council

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the quiet before a battle, Boros soldiers whisper prayers that steady their nerves and focus their minds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tenth District Guard enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Tenth has always been my home. This city is constantly embroiled in one crisis or another, but I'm determined to protect my piece."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) When Venerated Loxodon enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature that convoked it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature When Capture Sphere enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My specialty is theoretical universal limits and ways to circumvent them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Citywatch Sphinx dies, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All those who trade in questions must answer to the Dimir.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may shuffle up to four target cards from your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First, dispose of the evidence. Then dispose of your knowledge of its disposal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dimir Informant enters the battlefield, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The letters arrive, all sealed and read.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Laws apply only to those who lack the vision to see past them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying When Dream Eater enters the battlefield, surveil 4. When you do, you may return target nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand. (To surveil 4, look at the top four cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a blue spell, target player mills two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beneath Ravnica's streets runs a layer of tunnels, then caverns and waterways, then terrors and nightmares.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may look at an additional two cards each time you surveil. Exile Enhanced Surveillance: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who are the agents of the Dimir? No one and everyone." - Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Guild Summit enters the battlefield, you may tap any number of untapped Gates you control. Draw a card for each Gate tapped this way. Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a climate of suspicion, Isperia gathered the guilds to propose a radical idea: cooperation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Leapfrog has flying as long as you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Most compete for insects at street level. Some dwell near Izzet laboratories and ride the thermal updrafts." - Yolov, Simic bioengineer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Surveil 2, then choose an instant or sorcery card in your graveyard. You may cast it this turn. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 blue Bird Illusion creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rumors float through the city like crows, alighting on citizens seemingly at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Muse Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A composer wrote a symphony based on the drakes screeching outside her window. Reviews were mixed - except among the drakes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Narcomoeba is put into your graveyard from your library, you may put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What bait do you cast to catch a dream?" - Ravnican riddle

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Nightveil Sprite attacks, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're on the fortieth floor, with one window, no balcony. No one could possibly get in." - Minosz, Orzhov chief of security

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}, {T}: You may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She memorized every arcane text in the Ismeri Library by the time she was sixteen. Now she quizzes sphinxes in her spare time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My doors are called trespassing, my signatures, forgeries. They don't respect my talents, and I don't respect their labels."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Genius is finding the edge of what's possible, then jumping over it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return X target creatures of the creature type of your choice to their owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How thoughtful of the Legion to train its soldiers to fit our spell's specifications." - Nefara, Dimir agent

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have intel that some guilds have fallen under an invader's influence. Until we're sure, no venture succeeds." - Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Whenever you surveil, put a +1/+1 counter on Thoughtbound Phantasm. As long as Thoughtbound Phantasm has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first thing the mist chills is the mind. Victims never cry out or even murmur in surprise.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Vedalken Mesmerist attacks, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no need to sound the alarm. You are minding your post admirably. I am authorized. All is well."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fog haunts the streets, rendering the familiar as otherworldly, changing neighbors into shadows, and muffling cries for help.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Watcher in the Mist enters the battlefield, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What wishes do they grant? Mostly pinching-related ones." - Omik, superintendent of waterworks

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Barrier of Bones enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Dimir rarely make statements, but when they do, the message is clear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bats are welcome to eat thousands of my pets. I have multitudes more that will ultimately eat the bats." - Izoni

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink When Blood Operative enters the battlefield, you may exile target card from a graveyard. Whenever you surveil, if Blood Operative is in your graveyard, you may pay 3 life. If you do, return Blood Operative to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Burglar Rat enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even rats hoard their treasures. Are your precious things so different?" - Izoni

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No guilds - that is her rule. The House vampires unnerve her. The Combine would dissect her, the Legion burn her, the Conclave "cure" her. The shadows are all the family she needs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creeping Chill deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life. When Creeping Chill is put into your graveyard from your library, you may exile it. If you do, Creeping Chill deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All things considered, his first day on patrol could have gone better.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Pay 2 life: Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sound of every twisted secret tempts you to hear another.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The party of Rakdos revelers cackled and capered as the thing approached. It hissed, and they jabbed their torches at it, giggling when it recoiled. Then, one by one, the torches went out - and the screaming began.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature card with mana value 1 in your graveyard, then do the same for creature cards with mana value 2 and 3. Return those cards to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Variety is also the spice of death." - Cevraya, Golgari shaman

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They don't even feel the cut. I'm ordering a drink in a nearby tavern before anyone notices something's wrong."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}{B}, Discard a creature card: Return Kraul Swarm from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hive has a long memory. It knows how every member ever died, and to whom it owes the grudge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Undergrowth - When Lotleth Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target opponent for each creature card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I prefer the big and looming to the small and skittering." - Cevraya, Golgari shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Undergrowth - Search your library for a black card with mana value less than or equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ravnica's safest strongholds are often neither.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, Midnight Reaper deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one welcomes his visit, yet all must grant him tribute.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Undergrowth - When Moodmark Painter enters the battlefield, target creature gains menace and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Undergrowth - Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The assassins of the Ochran distill toxins from the remains of their previous victims.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's graveyard or hand and exile it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dimir assassins have the precision to slay a single memory.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Pilfering Imp: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Plaguecrafter enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My power is generosity, in a way. I give my survivors an appreciation for their lives."

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a legendary creature. Destroy target creature. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the patrol's armor was found, so tainted with the acrid smell of sudden death that it could never be worn again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Destroy target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen Ravnica's fate. Believe me, I'm doing you a favor."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Spinal Centipede dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Golgari adorn themselves with the exoskeletons of iridescent insects. It's only fair the insects do likewise.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Undercity Necrolisk. It gains menace until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In its territory, living is an affront.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}: Veiled Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I sang songs of sorrow for my lost love. Imagine my horror when, one night, they were answered." - Milana, Orzhov prelate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vicious Rumors deals 1 damage to each opponent. Each opponent discards a card, then mills a card. You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The alliances were already frayed. All we do is find the loose threads and pluck." - Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you surveil for the first time each turn, Whispering Snitch deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sure, I hear things. I hear plenty. But how am I to talk with this parched throat?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've cast three or more instant and sorcery spells this turn, return Arclight Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't stop till your horns come out their back."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Book Devourer deals combat damage to a player, you may discard all the cards in your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not my first edition of The Advokist and the Urchin!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Command the Storm deals 5 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the wake of Niv-Mizzet's disappearance, Ral found himself leading the guild. He had dreamed of this day, but couldn't help feeling like a pawn in someone else's game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cosmotronic Wave deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Creatures your opponents control can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This sort of innovation occurs when you set out to improve an electric tea kettle and misplace a decimal."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Direct Current deals 2 damage to any target. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Electrostatic Field deals 1 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's both an ingress-denial mechanism and an attractive hallway light!" - Daxiver, Izzet electromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Erratic Cyclops gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The League accepts no responsibility for former members and the damage they may cause." - Maree, Izzet chamberlain

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library. You can't play lands or cast spells from your hand. {3}{R}: Destroy Experimental Frenzy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Turns out coffee is the weird aunt of invention.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I spent some time in the Legion, but I'm done taking orders all day."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Fire Urchin gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rain runoff in the Smelting District is known to spontaneously burst into flame.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) {1}{R}: Goblin Banneret gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Boros banner stands tall even if its bearer doesn't.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice Goblin Cratermaker: Choose one - • Goblin Cratermaker deals 2 damage to target creature. • Destroy target colorless nonland permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Goblin Locksmith attacks, creatures with defender can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He's got more finesse than most goblins. He smashes windows with his fist rather than his forehead." - Arrester Polgar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target player. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Hellkite Whelp attacks, it deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They play by spitting fire at each other. Don't be offended if one gives you a love-scorch." - Esfir, Rakdos dragon wrangler

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Inescapable Blaze deals 6 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Izzet are blamed for every little disaster, which is unfair because we only cause most of them." - Mizzix of the Izmagnus

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lava Coil deals 4 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Commander, we caught the Dimir spy and took her ashes into custody." - Kramm, Wojek security officer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token. That token gains haste until end of turn and attacks this combat if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They tell us the wilds are ours, then they brick them over. They can lie to our faces but not to our fists." - Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Ornery Goblin blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ornery Goblin deals 1 damage to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nobody ever listens to my complaints! Not even when I use the listening stick."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent may have Risk Factor deal 4 damage to them. If that player doesn't, you draw three cards. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rubblebelt Boar enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some Gruul druids believe that boars are spawn of the great Ilharg, the mighty Raze-Boar who will one day rise and level the city.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a red spell, if Runaway Steam-Kin has fewer than three +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on Runaway Steam-Kin. Remove three +1/+1 counters from Runaway Steam-Kin: Add {R}{R}{R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't arrest him - enlist him!" - Commander Yaszen

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +1/+0 and have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They said obey and you'll be happy. They said you'll be safe. But we're not safe. We're not happy. And we will not obey." - Domri Rade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I packed three more electroconduits into each test wand. You'll experience a brief tingling sensation."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Sacrifice Torch Courier: Another target creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Light a torch and deliver this letter" were his instructions, which he unfortunately reversed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) Wojek Bodyguard can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By all means, take another step toward the captain."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Affectionate Indrik enters the battlefield, you may have it fight target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The problem isn't the indrik's enthusiasm, it's Ravnica's lack of guardrails.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The tiniest mouse speaks louder to me than all the festival crowds on Tin Street."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the very soul of battle, but even I would never advise open war with the Conclave." - Aurelia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and/or Gate cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The shortest path between two points is not always the safest." - Tamina, district guide

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy target creature with flying. • Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Dimir may look all they want. We never grow tired of swatting their bugs." - Heruj, Selesnya hierophant

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{G}: Devkarin Dissident gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is Mileva, in the Tenth. We've got an elf in the plaza with a chip on her shoulder. Actually, it's more of a morningstar."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When District Guide enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card or Gate card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The route is direct but challenging. Incidentally, how are you with heights?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Generous Stray enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cats place their gifts with care, so that a bare foot will step on them in the middle of the night.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Undergrowth - Golgari Raiders enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What the Golgari can't claim through patient undercity expansion, they seize in brazen topside sorties.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, reach {4}{G}: Grappling Sundew gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some rooftop gardens attract bees; others capture dragons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Undergrowth - When you cast this spell, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. You may put a green permanent card with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nearly invisible strands of web reach far beyond its lair to alert it of the approach of prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ironshell Beetle enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Please don't feed the beetles." - Promenade warning sign

property.name: Rules
property.value: Undergrowth - When Kraul Foragers enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Feed on food, you eventually rot. Feed on rot, you live forever. - Kraul saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Undergrowth - When Kraul Harpooner enters the battlefield, choose up to one target creature you don't control with flying. Kraul Harpooner gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard, then you may have Kraul Harpooner fight that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is nothing stronger than many hearts united for a single cause." - Emmara

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof You can't cast noncreature spells. {2}: Nullhide Ferox loses all abilities until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability. If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Nullhide Ferox, put it onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Selesnya grows its ranks in more ways than one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature you control enters the battlefield or dies, if that creature's power is greater than Pelt Collector's, put a +1/+1 counter on Pelt Collector. As long as Pelt Collector has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, it has trample.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature with defender: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature's way of saying "take the long way home."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Light up the dark to find your way, and the dark may seek you out." - Zalin the Gutter Bard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Suddenly, all the haggling didn't seem so important.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Choose one - • Create a 2/2 green and white Elf Knight creature token with vigilance. • Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When Urban Utopia enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ravnica's diversity produces blossoms of opinion in a rich soil of perspectives.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Undergrowth - When Vigorspore Wurm enters the battlefield, target creature gains vigilance and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. Vigorspore Wurm can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to three target multicolored cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Vivid Revival.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Golgari crops bloom in strange soils, touched only by long-traveled light.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be like the grazers of the Saruli. Keep your herd close, and stay alert for encroaching danger." - Lalia, Selesnya dryad

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once part of a wealthy merchant's private zoo, the herd roams feral throughout the Tenth, where it will remain until the guilds can agree to relocate, cull, or befriend it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Tap target creature. • Target creature gets -2/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dimir assassinations are choreographed like dance routines. Each challenge is anticipated and countered with graceful ease.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target permanent an opponent controls. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A power vacuum for the Azorius. A keepsake for Vraska.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose up to one target creature you control. Until end of turn, that creature gets +2/+0, gains trample if it's red, and gains vigilance if it's white.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Beacon Bolt deals damage to target creature equal to the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Beamsplitter Mage, if you control one or more other creatures that spell could target, choose one of those creatures. Copy that spell. The copy targets the chosen creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) {2}{R}{W}: Boros Challenger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Send your champion. I could use a light workout."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of creatures you control. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Within the song of Mat'Selesnya, one becomes all." - Heruj, Selesnya hierophant

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Centaur Peacemaker enters the battlefield, each player gains 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Please accept this offering. I sincerely hope to leave my mace at my side."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control gain indestructible. Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is not your time. The Legion still needs your blade."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Charnel Troll. Otherwise, sacrifice it. {B}{G}, Discard a creature card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Charnel Troll.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Conclave Cavalier dies, create two 2/2 green and white Elf Knight creature tokens with vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just as leaves fall and the tree blooms again, one day I will fall and the Conclave will endure."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. {5}{W}, {T}: Create a 2/2 green and white Elf Knight creature token with vigilance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Crackling Drake's power is equal to the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard. When Crackling Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you've surveilled this turn, Darkblade Agent has deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen your house, and you've been a lovely, if unwitting, host. But at last it's time for farewells."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Deafening Clarion deals 3 damage to each creature. • Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Commander, what's the signal to attack?" "You'll know."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Whenever you surveil, put a +1/+1 counter on Dimir Spybug.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just assume every conversation is on record.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Disinformation Campaign enters the battlefield, you draw a card and each opponent discards a card. Whenever you surveil, return Disinformation Campaign to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "People would sooner savor sweet lies than chew plain truths." - Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Emmara, Soul of the Accord becomes tapped, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whatever hatred destroys, a single act of trust can revive."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a creature card: Erstwhile Trooper gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Erstwhile - rotten of body and outmoded in dress, but unfailing in loyalty." - Vraska

property.name: Rules
property.value: Etrata, the Silencer can't be blocked. Whenever Etrata deals combat damage to a player, exile target creature that player controls and put a hit counter on that card. That player loses the game if they own three or more exiled cards with hit counters on them. Etrata's owner shuffles Etrata into their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a charge counter on Firemind's Research. {1}{U}, Remove two charge counters from Firemind's Research: Draw a card. {1}{R}, Remove five charge counters from Firemind's Research: It deals 5 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Garrison Sergeant has double strike as long as you control a Gate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Legion, no flagpole is merely decorative, and every ceremonial sword bears an edge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Glowspore Shaman enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a land card from your graveyard on top of your library. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From death she grows living grandeur.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Result 752: Rapid mass redistribution. "Result 753: Calamitous reverse synthesis. "Result 754: Acute disarrayment." - Izzet research notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Golgari Findbroker enters the battlefield, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We gather the past from surface dwellers and sell it right back to them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Giants know a solid hit is one part strength, four parts leverage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}, {T}: Target creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. {2}{B}, {T}: Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards. Then you may discard a nonland card. When you do, Hypothesizzle deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's like blowing up an arcane library in a thermobaric explosion. But in a good way." - Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Ionize deals 2 damage to that spell's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Countermagic is a simple process of breaking matter into its elementary particles."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Undergrowth - When Izoni, Thousand-Eyed enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black and green Insect creature token for each creature card in your graveyard. {B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all creatures you control. They gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are the shield that never breaks, the bough that never burns, the song that can never be silenced."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who show no mercy to the weak deserve no mercy from the strong." - Firemane Kavrova

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Knight of Autumn enters the battlefield, choose one - • Put two +1/+1 counters on Knight of Autumn. • Destroy target artifact or enchantment. • You gain 4 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Lazav, the Multifarious enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) {X}: Lazav, the Multifarious becomes a copy of target creature card in your graveyard with mana value X, except its name is Lazav, the Multifarious, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has this ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{U}, {T}: Draw a card. {X}{R}, {T}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control with mana value X. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Ledev Champion attacks, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Ledev Champion gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature tapped this way. {3}{G}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}{R}, {T}: Legion Guildmage deals 3 damage to each opponent. {2}{W}, {T}: Tap another target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our forces number more than the leaves of Vitu-Ghazi. Do not provoke us."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile all opponents' graveyards. You may cast spells from among those cards this turn, and mana of any type can be spent to cast them. At the beginning of the next end step, if any of those cards remain exiled, return them to their owners' graveyards. Exile Mnemonic Betrayal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Undergrowth - This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard. When Molderhulk enters the battlefield, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, deathtouch Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Three daggers left in an angel's back, three enforcers with memory loss, three keys stolen from my own belt - and you talk of peace?" - Tajic, to Aurelia

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, Parun deals 1 damage to any target. Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, you draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Surveil 2, then draw two cards. Notion Rain deals 2 damage to you. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: City air is a constant drizzle of private thoughts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch All creatures able to block Ochran Assassin do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dagger is just the distraction. I carry the real killer in a vial at my side."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard. −3: Ral, Izzet Viceroy deals damage to target creature equal to the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard. −8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, this emblem deals 4 damage to any target and you draw two cards."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Undergrowth - Rhizome Lurcher enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dead gain new purpose here. What is strange in the eyes of other guilds is harmonious in ours." - Devesh, Golgari shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I long for peaceful times, when I may tend to my garden instead of our borders."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Squadrons of skyknights are available for deployment around the clock, capable of reaching any district in the city within minutes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap target creature. Sonic Assault deals 2 damage to that creature's controller. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He heard stars and saw thunder.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sumala Woodshaper enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{B}, {T}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) {1}{G}, {T}: You gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever Swathcutter Giant attacks, it deals 1 damage to each creature defending player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now do you understand what we meant when we said disperse?" - Eksari, Boros patrol leader

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A swiftblade is an artist, each fiery trail of their blades a fleeting masterpiece traced on the air.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to other creatures you control. {R}{W}: Tajic, Legion's Edge gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Thief of Sanity deals combat damage to a player, look at the top three cards of that player's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest into their graveyard. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's truly the highest honor, isn't it? To be remembered? Pity for you."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it for each other instant and sorcery spell you've cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ral's storm crackled with mystical detections: Planeswalkers were infiltrating Ravnica.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other creatures you control get +1/+1. When Trostani Discordant enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink. At the beginning of your end step, each player gains control of all creatures they own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) Whenever Truefire Captain is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn. Then target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now it's your turn to hide." - Vraska

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would draw a card, instead look at the top three cards of your library, then put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Pay 4 life: Underrealm Lich gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a card name. Search target opponent's graveyard, hand, and library for up to four cards with that name and exile them. That player shuffles, then draws a card for each card exiled from their hand this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A well-chosen word can restore a mind or snap its tethers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: You may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, you gain 1 life and draw a card. −3: Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less. −9: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Wee Dragonauts gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Something's causing electrospheric disruption in the blazekite's spire-vanes. Find the cause, and tell them to keep it up!" - Juzba, Izzet tinker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Worldsoul Colossus enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, Fresh-Faced Recruit has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hold on to your ideals. They'll be tested more than your armor or the edge of your blade." - Tajic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender As long as you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn, Piston-Fist Cyclops can attack as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its hyperpneumatics can punch through a wall and the spy on the other side.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The reign of the Swarm begins. Let us rise now and dress ourselves in vengeance."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Selesnya's soil is sacred, and you're about to meet it with your face."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Whisper Agent enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has a job to finish, and it's you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We pass these along to our fellow soldiers to recognize deeds of valor. It won't stay with you for long." - Alovnek, Boros guildmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chamber Sentry enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it. {X}, {T}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Chamber Sentry: It deals X damage to any target. {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Return Chamber Sentry from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color." {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By guild tradition, any puddle of multicolored light on the cobblestones can serve as neutral ground.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {UB}{UB}{UB}{UB}, {T}, Sacrifice Dimir Locket: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wear this, and take your place among the shadows - wise, lethal, and unseen." - Ivrelya, Dimir spymaster

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Gatekeeper Gargoyle enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each Gate you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each night it visits a different guildgate around the city, digging its talons into fresh stone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 for each Gate you control and has vigilance and menace. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {B} or {G}. {BG}{BG}{BG}{BG}, {T}, Sacrifice Golgari Locket: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wear it at all times. It will guide our reanimators to your corpse." - Mazirek, kraul death priest

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {U} or {R}. {UR}{UR}{UR}{UR}, {T}, Sacrifice Izzet Locket: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember to discharge your locket every seven hours. Unless you prefer the spontaneous aether overload, of course." - Daxiver, Izzet electromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Rampaging Monument enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Rampaging Monument.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be advised: suspect is nine stories tall, marble hair, answers to Saint Gusztav."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G} or {W}. {GW}{GW}{GW}{GW}, {T}, Sacrifice Selesnya Locket: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Think of the locket as a seed you bear, spreading life from Vitu-Ghazi across all of Ravnica." - Heruj, Selesnya hierophant

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Silent Dart: It deals 3 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These terms are acceptable to House Dimir. Shall we shake on it?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Mill a card. {2}, {T}, Exile Wand of Vertebrae: Shuffle up to five target cards from your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made by the mad for the work of the wicked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The more trust breaks down, the more we must throw open the front gates." - Aurelia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is our duty to protect all those in need. But the other guilds have never shown themselves worthy of that protection." - Tajic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every guild dreads infiltration. I should know - I've been a member of all of them." - Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've found this place only because you were summoned. Pray you're worthy of the invitation." - Etrata

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield tapped. When Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Chamber of the Guildpact stands as a reminder that even the bitterest struggles can end in cooperation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Shut the gates. In the Underrealm we will outlast the coming doom." - Vraska

property.name: Rules
property.value: Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Jarad was a friend to the Devkarin. Now we slink through neglected tunnels, befriending those who crawl them." - Izoni

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color. If that mana is spent on a multicolored creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every laboratory buzzes with new experiments, each a piece of Ral's ambitious project.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yesterday I didn't recognize my own guild. Today I see why. And for tomorrow I must be prepared." - Niv-Mizzet

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {B} or {G}.) As Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cradle of the Golgari's new kingdom. Grave of those who wronged its queen.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {R} or {W}.) As Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will not be trained here. You will be forged." - Commander Yaszen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everyone who crosses that threshold is our most cherished friend. Everyone who crosses it again is our bitterest enemy." - Trostani

property.name: Rules
property.value: Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We leave our gardens open, so all may know wonder, but guarded, so all may know peace." - Emmara

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {U} or {R}.) As Steam Vents enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A massive new Izzet building project with an unstated purpose? Probably fine." - Zija, Simic mutationist

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {G} or {W}.) As Temple Garden enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where the roots reach, there the temple rises." - Niszka, Selesnya evangel

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few believe Duskmantle exists. Fewer find it. None live to bear witness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Draw a card. −2: Ral, Caller of Storms deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets. −7: Draw seven cards. Ral, Caller of Storms deals 7 damage to each creature your opponents control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Ral, Caller of Storms, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Precision Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ral had wielded lightning all his life but had never harnessed the power of an entire guild.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Whenever Ral's Staticaster attacks, if you control a Ral planeswalker, Ral's Staticaster gets +1/+0 for each card in your hand until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. That creature gains menace until end of turn. −3: Destroy target creature. −1[0]: For each creature card in your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kraul once skulked in the outskirts of Golgari society, but with Vraska's rise, they became valued forces of the Swarm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Attendant of Vraska dies, if you control a Vraska planeswalker, you gain life equal to Attendant of Vraska's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Erstwhile were unearthed from their tombs, they became a ready-made army for Vraska.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. You gain life equal to its toughness. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Vraska, Regal Gorgon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Indestructible

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ultimate answer to intrigue and subtlety.
